website_summaries.verdict: A tasty, crunchy, and meat-free alternative that will help keep your dog’s skin, coat, and immune system healthy.
pros: Made with tasty and healthy ingredients uncommonly seen in dog biscuits, like yogurt and banana
Utilizes all-natural grains, fruits, and veggies
cons: Some dogs may not appreciate a meat-free biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Found fillers such as a string in some of those ...
customer_reviews.text: Found fillers such as a string in some of those cookies which are suppose to be high quality dog cookies. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: sou

customer_reviews.title: *** Expired ***
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on August 5, 2017. The product arrived on August 7, 2017. All is well until I decided to open the package today to feed my kygo a treat only to discover one little problem. The product's about 4 years passed its "best by" date. Look at picture: it really is worth a thousand words. Some that come to mind are "vomiting" and "diarrhea". Because it has been months since I purchased the product it is outside their return window. So yay me. At least I found a solution to eradicating the rat population in my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hu

customer_reviews.title: This product is not chicken by-product free as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My Pit bull Terrier (Bully) is allergic to chicken. Bought the Blue Buffalo Health Bars because they are listed as not containing any chicken/poultry by-product meals. After feeding this to my Bully I read the ingredients information and found out the bars contain chicken meal. I will be returning these for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs...Lots Of Crumbs And Dust.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and my dog loves these bars HOWEVER, this package arrived in a good sized box with not one bit of padding. This is a 16 ounce package and 5.7 ounces are crumbs and lots of dust. There is not one bar that is not damaged and 99% of what is not crumbs or dust is maybe half of the bar. This should have been shipped with better padding to protect the product. Much of this is going in the trash as I cannot feed crumbs and dust to a large dog. Good product...lousy packing and shipping and this one was shipped via UPS
customer_reviews.author: GSD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy/Yappy customers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as an add on item to reach the $35 for free shipping... My pit mix and chihuahua puppy were running out of treats and these seemed like a no brainer... I break a tiny piece off for the chi and give the rest to my pit. They both LOVE these pumpkin and cinnamon biscuits! We're all highly satisfied :) will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these if your dog is gluten intolerant
customer_reviews.text: I found this product by searching Amazon for "gluten free dog treats". While they do not contain wheat, the do contain both barley and rye which are sources of gluten. We had been using the Blue Buffalo treats labeled "Grain free" but gave this one a try to offer a little variety. Our dog's stomach issues returned immediately. I've suggested that Amazon add a photo of the back of the bag as they have for other Blue Buffalo treats so that pet owners can check the complete list of ingredients before purchasing. Otherwise, I am certain that the Health Bars are an excellent product as is everything from Blue Buffalo. They just didn't meet our dog's dietary requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My picky little brat doesn’t get excited for them unless she has been deprived of jerky or similar treats for a few days. But, if I stick half of one of these on top of her kibble, she runs with it to her bed to gobble it down like a kid sneaking a cookie before dinner. Just for that look of happiness on her face when she finds this on her food and my entertainment watching this, I will continue to purchase these. Definitely a great value and quality ingredients. I’ve given friends and my family’s dogs these, they were much more excited than my spoiled treat monster.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo dog treats sent my dog to the hospital
customer_reviews.text: My dog got extremely sick after digesting blue Buffalo’s treats. I am grateful she has made it through OK but I sincerely hope that blue Buffalo and blue wilderness will discover the errors in their ways and become a better business that actually Cares for their product.
customer_reviews.author: L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and one other flavor. Within one day my dog started having severe diarrhea and vomiting. As the only food she gets is home made people quality other than this new addition of BB treats, I assume it is the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Davilyn Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Tired of them being cracker dust
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love Blue Buffalo treats and these are one of their favorites. It’s not the product, it gets 5 stars. However I don’t know if they used these bags for a game of catch in the warehouse or ran over them with a forklift but they are smashed into little pieces. Although we will continue to purchase their favorite banana yogurt treats, it will no longer be through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy or Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Fur Baby Tested and Approved
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these treats are all natural and not loaded with ingredients that can make my dogs sick. I have three smaller breed dogs. I break the squares in half when I give them each one. I purchased a small bag at one of my local stores, just to try it and see if they liked it, the results were amazing and they all loved them. The price is very reasonable, compared to the pet supply stores, they're actually cheaper on Amazon. I feel good about giving my pets something they love as well as something I love and trust. Great flavors, they love them all, I think you'll agree.
customer_reviews.author: Debby P.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, free of chicken by-products & a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: My dog lives for her nightly treat & comes to remind me! This biscuit is clearly so good that she drools while I’m getting it-which she’s NEVER done with other treats. It is free of chicken by-products(Which I’ve read are not good for most dogs) & chicken, which she’s allergic to. It’s healthy, crunchy & the ONLY chicken-free treat I could find online AND at the grocery, after an exhaustive search!
customer_reviews.author: M R.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has terrible allergies to most ingredients in dog food and treats. He can only eat vegetarian dog food, and Natural Balance does not make a vegetarian treat. I was pleased when I found these. They aren’t available locally for some reason so I have to buy them on here. He always asks for them and our other dog loves to too.
customer_reviews.author: JonasGeek

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Digs Them
customer_reviews.text: Idk what it is about these biscuits but by dog wants one every morning and then proceeds to walk around with it looking for a place to hide it. He doesn’t get around to eating it until later. He really really likes them and yes he does sometimes take them outside and dig a spot to hide them. Those are not allowed back in the home if he happens to remember where they are. Can’t say I’ve tasted these but the smell yummy. We have tried several flavors but there are his fave.
customer_reviews.author: J. AjakhTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but Amazon order/description issues?
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the Bacon Egg & Cheese variety. She tends to look suspiciously at other treats but she devours these. 5 stars for the product. That said, I ordered the BEC variety but received the Apple & Yogurt. Tried through Amazon's site to exchange the Apple & Yogurt for the Bacon and it automatically ordered the Apple & Yogurt variety again, so I cancelled the exchange. Called in to Amazon service and they were able to take care of the order, but there may be issues with the linkage to the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Essie

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, approximately 85% of the treats where crumbled. The pups seem to like the crumbs, but I'm sure they would enjoy a full bar much better. I was very excited to get the bars, but very disappointed that they were broken up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dog approves
customer_reviews.text: nice size biscuit. i have a 14-pounder who isn't supposed to have extra calories (per vet) so i break them into pieces and give out sparingly. i guess they would be expensive otherwise, but this works for us and my dog really enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: a new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves these treats. they are a favorite. they are a great price, and i like blue buffalo as a brand. they are a really good size treat. almost too big for my dog as a treat. so i break them in half at times and give him the rest later. my dog pretty much eats most treats i give him. but he makes it clear which are the preferred treats. blue buffalo health bars pumpkin and cinnamon flavor are at the way way top for him. a big hit in our household!
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. I love to give my dog anything blue buffalo however theses give my dog diarrhea. And no it is not just the amazon ones, it is theses particular dog biscuits. But I don’t have anything against them I guess it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large box of tasty treats came well packaged. Treats not broken as in other reviews! The treats are on a bag inside of the box so they stay fresh. I put half of them in a glass canister so they’re handy on the counter. Just the right size for our little Belle! She loves the bacon, egg and cheese flavor and doesn’t want to stop at one! And you can’t beat the per ounce price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when ordering
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a particular type of dog goodies, but got a different 'flavor' than I ordered. I would guess that the error is because the picture of two of the different flavors are reversed, so the Amazon employee picking the product, apparently going by the picture, selects the wrong one. My order called for 'Bacon, Egg & Cheese' flavor, but the picture of the product ordered is for 'Apples and Yogurt'. Hopefully, Amazon will correct this issue.
customer_reviews.author: tgamb

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love then and healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 older std poodles, liver issues with one. Bought as recommended. Opened thought didn't have much smell lol. But all 3 LOVE THEM!! Yes i would recommend these treats. Still Buy them regularly! You will be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Katbird

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend (if on sale)! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they were on sale for $3.50/ 1 lb bag. I definitely wouldn't buy them at the regular price ($8.50/ 1lb bag), as that seems super overpriced for a mass produced dog biscuit to me. But, when on sale, these are well worth the purchase. ALL our dogs love them! We have 3 Malamute/Husky Hybrids, a female Husky, 5 Pomeranian/Chihuahuas and a Corgi/German Shepherd mix. They all know exactly where these treats are kept in the house & consistently beg for them after dinner each night.
customer_reviews.author: rtlueckTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let The Pumkin & Cinnmon Fool You! These Are As Hard As A Brick!!️
customer_reviews.text: My Pom, would not touch this bar, I tried everything to get her to taste if. She looked at me as if I had offered her some poison! If you don;t have a dog that will eat anything, don't bother buying these bars! When I opened the bag, I thought, they are very hard, good for the teeth... Wrong not good to my pet. She can be a picky eater, but I have never bought treats that she would not eat. I have a whole bag, that I will have to throw away! Blue Buffalo blew it with these treats... no wonder they are an Add On!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon13

customer_reviews.title: Higher fiber dog treat
customer_reviews.text: We bought these just because they had a little more fiber than the others at the store (6.5%) perhaps due the pumpkin. My vet had recommended increasing fiber in our dog’s diet due to anal gland issues and canned pumpkin was suggested because of the fiber. I thought it was a risky flavor (Pumpkin Spice basically) but our dog loves these biscuits. My only complaint is that they crumble easily. No matter if I get them at the store or from Amazon, they are usually lots of broken treats. We just add the bits and pieces to her food bowl and she’s happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Likes 'Em
customer_reviews.text: Our 85-lb. white German Shepherd likes them just fine. I do, however, think they should be a little smaller. That way, the dog/puppy is not getting such a large treat, and you can give them a little more often for good behavior or whatever. And, providing BB doesn't change the package net weight if they started making them a little smaller, there would be more treats to a package. BB makes some of their varieties of treats smaller (we also use the Denali Salmon), and so I believe they could also do this with the Health Bars (of course, then maybe they couldn't refer to them as 'bars'. Overall, a thumbs-up for this product.
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, current rip-off price.
customer_reviews.text: I paid 3.88 here as an add on item. Now they are betweent 12 and 18, a rip-off. One bag 30% of the product was crumbled. All 3 bags had unacceptable amount of crumbled cookies. I ended up pouring them into the dog bowl. So I'm back to buying them from the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: jacarape

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is generally not too excited about biscuits. He likes these. I actually have tasted them. The taste is pretty good. Update: My dog is not really that into these biscuits, no worse than other biscuits. They kept his interest for about a couple weeks. Because of the good ingredients, lowering my rating by only one star though 3 and a half stars would be more what I would like to give.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Will not reorder
customer_reviews.text: Arrived open with defective sealing on the top of bag which is supposed to keep package fresh and closed. (ridges on top of bag do not join together). Product very stale smelling. My dog who happily loves any treat I give her, took one sniff and left it lay without tasting. Unusual problems for this brand, but have never before tried this specific product.I will not order again and will hesitate ordering any products by this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Shylah

customer_reviews.title: My friend's dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: This may sound weird, but I buy dog treats for my friend's dog once in a while, but my friend's dog is the cutest dog ever, so I can't help it (and, I don't eve have a dog myself). She eats this with such excitement, so I'm giving it 5 stars. Ingredients seem healthy as well (otherwise, I wouldn't have bought it for her). Good treat!
customer_reviews.author: Passerby

customer_reviews.title: CBD
customer_reviews.text: I use these to give my dog his cbd oil 3 times a day. I break them up into pieces so they last longer. They break pretty easily and my other dog gets one for participation. Neither one of them had any reservations and ate them right away. They get excited when they hear the jar open. Great price with ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates these
customer_reviews.text: These are like the raisins of dog treats. The ingredients may be pet parent approved, but my dog doesn't like these. If you put these side by side with milk bones, they'll lose in a landslide. I give them to my dog and he'll just leave it and eat it later, after he's hungry. Normally with any other treat, he gobbles up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Dog had upset stomach after eating treats. Later to see him poop out a stick (we watch him very closely) Now reading the reviews its evident he ingested it from one of these cookies. Poorly made product. Shame this is under the blue buffalo name. No refund policy...what a joke
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyhitch

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I love BB products
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I have to give a negative review for these. After giving these to my dog the past 2 evenings (one bar each night), she has woken me up early the next morning throwing up/sick. No dietary changes, this is the only variable that changed. Disappointed because I love BB products. Not sure if I just got a bad batch or what.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Luna Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We have been getting these for our boxer pup for about a year now and Luna loves them. The tend to make a bit of a mess as she eats so we toss them in her dog bowl. So far we haven’t had any issues with packaging or freshness.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeerFather

customer_reviews.title: Every biscuit in both boxes broken into small pieces
customer_reviews.text: These two boxes appear to have been run through a shaking machine. Literally every biscuit was broken into small pieces. DO NOT buy from this seller or through Amazon. I suspect these were "rejects" from the manufacturer (my dogs had GI issues after they ate from this batch) or Amazon shipping is worse than I expected, if that's possible. In any event DO NOT buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: 65 pound poodle likes them.
customer_reviews.text: 65 pound poodle likes these. Many have reported breakage in shipment. I have been lucky but still see a few pulverized biscuits at the bottom of the box. I transfer biscuits to resealable bags when I receive the shipment so I know the damage was there when it arrived. I will keep buying until I experience the breakage that some have reported.
customer_reviews.author: NeilW

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love having veggies as a treat...I came across these bars and wanted to try. They are bigger than I was expecting so I ended up breaking a bar in half to share with the dogs. The pups seem to love them. These are meant to be a "special" occasion treat so be care not to over feed as indicated on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy412

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but not by mail.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 GSD love the flavor of these biscuits and have been eating them for about a year. Since we could not buy them at the store we opted for online purchase and delivery. Twice we received them quick, but every single biscuit was crumbled into almost powder. Ill pay the extra $3 at the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Marti & Eloy

customer_reviews.title: Treats are big enough my dog can't swallow them whole!
customer_reviews.text: My medium sized dog Lexi loves these! They are large enough that she can't swallow them whole and has to chew them. She actually sits and enjoys them! I love the fact that inside the big box they come in, the treats are packed nicely in a sealed bag! No broken pieces or crumbs falling out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Tigger and Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: What's great about these is the size and ingredients. It's nice to find healthy biscuits so my dogs can much on something rather than inhaling it. Love that the is no meat as they get that in their food. It's basically oatmeal and flaxseed and I figure my dogs like sweets too. I only buy the banana and pumpkin flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are so spoiled - but they like these!
customer_reviews.text: My toy-size dogs are so fussy. They would only eat Wagatha's organic treats for years. But Wagatha's changed the shape/size of the cookie and then my dogs would have nothing to do with them ! Honest! Glad I found these. They love them. Carry them around and hide them in secret places for later! :)
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Larger breeds only
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly large, DRY, HARD, biscuits. No, not stale- the expiration date was far in advance of when we received the Health Bars. My dog would take it to her doggie bed and chew on one getting crumbs all over. She's a 19 lb. dog. I think this is better suited for large breeds and should be marketed as such. I ended up having to break up the biscuits into smaller pieces (since it was too big for her to fit the whole thing in her mouth, and put the pieces in her doggie dish. That way she wouldn't make crumbs every where nor have such a hard time chewing.
customer_reviews.author: N S.

customer_reviews.title: Made our dogs sick, so sad :-(
customer_reviews.text: We really hoped these would be a delicious healthy treat for our dogs, but we have tried them on three occasions and EVERY TIME, both dogs get an upset stomach. :-( Blue Buffalo is a high quality brand, but this particular recipe make little doggies sick.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDestinyRoseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: They're the perfect treat to also keep him occupied for at least ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd bag of these now, and my Boston Terrier puppy (IG: @henrikbostonterrier) loves these! They're the perfect treat to also keep him occupied for at least 15 minutes as his little teething mouth slowly works away at the tasty chunky biscuit. I also tried the Bacon flavor but he's definitely more into these Chicken flavored ones so i'll continue to keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Change the information label telling you it has chicken
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a treat for my dog that does not have chicken. It does not tell you this when you are buying it. After two days of giving it to my dog, I saw on the box that it has chicken meal. This should have been put on the ingredients but it does not. I am not happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: William Delgado

customer_reviews.title: They're fine but I probably won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: These were bigger than I thought they'd be which is not the product or seller's fault. However, they are really crumbly, so I can't break them up without making a mess which I'm not a fan of. I don't know about the flavor lol my dog loves them but then again she will eat poop!
customer_reviews.author: Dea A

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Treats.
customer_reviews.text: All of my four Dogs just love these Dog Treats, as after they first go outside in the morning and do their business, they automatically corner me in the Kitchen, so I can give them each their Dog Treat. No artificial anything in these Dog Treats, which is why I love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: dogs loved them
customer_reviews.text: Can't attest to flavor although all natural so guess could have let the kids try.... The dogs are large and these were a good size for them. Big enough to break in half to make twice as many treats. Bought as gifts for other dogs but will buy for mine too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Likes Them -- That's What Counts
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Blue Buffalo products, so I was glad to find these natural dog treats. They are large, and I have a medium sized dog, so he only gets one, but he loves them. I like them because he is actually chewing his food. He always swallowed previous treats whole. Price for a box this size is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Daktari

customer_reviews.title: My dogs would not eat any of three different flavor treat/cookies.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs a Bichon and a PooChon will not eat any of the three different flavors,even though they eat Blue Buffalo dry dog food daily. I thought they would like a different cookie treat, Wrong! did not like at all, I wasted $$ buying this item 3-pack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Treats turned to crumbs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats so I decided to subscribe to product so I'd always have some on hand. For the product I gave 5 stars. However, in the 2 orders I've received all the treats are broken and half the bag is just crumbs. Bags were just thrown into a box without any type of packing material.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: dogs love this treat
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs love this treat. It is a very large biscuit. I give each of our dogs one before our morning walk, which seems to satisfy them for the entire 40 minute walk, until they get back home for breakfast. The package lasts for quite while because the size of the treats means you do not give them very often during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves 'em
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retriever loves these biscuits. She gets one a day, last thing before bed. They are great for dogs her size (75 lbs) but are way too big for smaller breeds. These are much too big and costly for use as training treats. While not overly fragile, some of these biscuits break in shipment. Bottom line, though these treats are a bit pricy, our dog loves 'em and at 1/day I'll keep buying them for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, healthy treat for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: Although I can’t opine on the taste, my dog loves them. They are very sturdy and it take a few minutes fo my 11 year old, 50 lb. sweet puppy to finish. My box arrived without any broken biscuits. Price is great and I trust Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Kayrob1031

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to provide some variety to my dog. My daughter actually started giving the dog a cookie with whipped cream on top each night. He LOVED it. He also eats them without whipped cream. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag of treats
customer_reviews.text: My little dog didn't care for these but he is picky ! They did arrive with several broken ones in the package which is not a problem for us because we would break them anyway. If you have a big dog you probably would like them whole.
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Steffes

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this treat.
customer_reviews.text: I have to go by my dogs reaction, since I haven't tasted them. I know they love them. When I reach for the treat boss, they are right by me. Sitting to get theirs. Packaged well so they aren't broken when I received them. I've bought them more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to love these. Since switching from Old Mother Hubbard to Blue, our Goldendoodle has started persistently standing by the "treat cabinet". I saw them on Amazon for less than I spend in the store, so I ordered a bunch. I was concerned they may arrive cracked and broken up, but they were all in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: CassNC

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't think much of these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the quality advertised. The dog must not have read the box, and she wasn't impressed. Probably a bit too much like the kibble she doesn't like either. A treat, in her mind, is a bit more tasty even it's not so good health wise.
customer_reviews.author: MollyDogsFriend

customer_reviews.title: Smashed, to small to even give as a treat
customer_reviews.text: This item came SMASHED all treats are broken into tiny pieces. I am extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Me too

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd loves them
customer_reviews.text: I was very glad to find them as I squeeze them into my German Sherpherds extra large Kong toy. Only thing I can find to work with it. He loves both the health bars and the Kong to chew on. Gives him something to do and away from other things.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Loves Them :)
customer_reviews.text: Good crunchy treat for my golden doodle, easy to break into smaller portions for playing fetch. All natural ingredients are also a plus. Most of the biscuits also remained in tact, not to much powder at the bottom of the bag when they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Maciej Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes em.
customer_reviews.text: I have heard a lot of bad things about additives in dog biscuits, so I thought we’d give these a try. Every night before I go to bed, my dog gets a treat. The first time I gave him half of one of these, they are pretty big, he hobbled it up! And they smell pretty good nice to know he can have something healthier and affordable too. The only problem I had, was a few of them were crumbled in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: melisstau30

customer_reviews.title: Good biscuits
customer_reviews.text: Love these biscuits for my dog. He seems to like all flavors - although I ordered the apple ones ( the description said Apple, the picture showed the bacon ones) and received the bacon ones. Looks like the pictures and descriptions are mismatched. I really love the large box instead of the smaller pouch. The biscuits don’t seem to break as much. Blue Buffalo - please sell the pumpkin ones in the big box!
customer_reviews.author: thumper

customer_reviews.title: Bars broken into small pieces. Poor Shipping & Handling
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. Unfortunately I didn't open the pkg til this week and most of the bars were broken into small pieces, I assume during shipping. So really unsuitable for treats & training for him. In future I'll still buy this great product ... but locally.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marilyn Naito

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't agree with my dogs at all
customer_reviews.text: I never leave negative reviews but because of my fur babies I must..These made both my dogs very sick..It took me a few days to realize it was the health bars and I'm Thankful they both are going to recover..
customer_reviews.author: SunnyD

customer_reviews.title: Zero flavor
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs refused to even take it. They both smelled it and walked away. Where is the bacon and cheese? These cookies smell like saw dust, probably taste like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews from our dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe some of our dogs are a little picky but they only eat them when no other treats are available. Then they will sit and ponder if they’re encouraging us to buy them if they eat one. Need a higher meat content for the house wolves.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: Our Anatolian Shepherd just loves these biscuits. They have quickly become his favorite treat. I can't always find them in the store though so I was glad Amazon had them and they were the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: My puppy tries anything and he was not interested in these.
customer_reviews.text: They are edible, but my dog does not get excited for these. He looks at me like, really? What else is in that cupboard. He doesn't even take them out of my hand, just walks away. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shalome

customer_reviews.title: Hole in bag
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these biscuits, that is not the problem. The bag inside had a hole in it, so the treats are stall and they don't smell right. I didn't notice the hole until I opened the bag. Very disappointed! Had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: 4everbme

customer_reviews.title: Nice treats!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love these treats. They are dye free, which is very important to me. A lot of people complained about broken bits, but maybe they have better shipping practices now, as they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: A bit big for medium or small sized dogs as ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit big for medium or small sized dogs as it is about 3 x 2 inches. Mine is about 20 pounds and its just a bit difficult to eat and tends to make a mess as he chips away at eating it. Currently I will break it up in about 3-4 pieces and put it in his bowl to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy the big box
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. When you purchase the bag, though, Amazon sends it loose in a larger box usually with other stuff so the biscuits get broken into small pieces. The box travels better.
customer_reviews.author: heike6

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these (she hasn't said so, but I'm pretty sure of it)
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull / greyhound mix loves these bars. I usually break them in two and give her the one half in the evening, along with her glucosamine treat, after she gets her teeth brushed. She loves the crunch on them, and they're pretty easy to break into smaller pieces. Also, at the shelter I volunteer at, I put a little Kong Bacon and Cheese Stuff'N on top of one of these biscuits, and I have yet to meet a dog, no matter how scared, aggressive, shy, etc. that won't happily devour it up. And it's Blue Buffalo, so it's made in the USA. What more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats more than anything else I have ever bought. Good ingredients. Super affordable! And even more affordable through Amazon Prime subscribe and save. I am going to buy again so why not subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Our pups LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: We want healthy treats for our dogs and these were recommended by a local rescue group. You can break them in half for little bitty babes but they are the perfect size for our standard Dachshunds.
customer_reviews.author: Action Family

customer_reviews.title: My bigger dog LOVES them
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these as a treat for my dogs at bedtime. I choose to give them at bedtime because it is a harder treat than the Blue Wilderness Treats. The hardness seems to help with keeping their teeth clean.
customer_reviews.author: FindingTime2Read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bigger breeds!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have loved these treats for a year and a half now Great for large breeds We have a Great Dane/Mastiff mix and a Boxer/Mastiff mix It is hard to find decent size treats for large breeds These are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: mike pepper

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and they are perfect size for him. Also great value
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Poor Shipping
customer_reviews.text: We love these treats for our dog! They are both healthy and tasty (so I am told). The package, however, came crushed on 1 end and many of the treats broken! It is tough trying to find where to go to get the problem remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WATCH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: When I got these there was a good $10-$15 difference in flavors. I got these for around $5, not realizing I was just lucky. Should've bought 5x of them. Now they are up to $15 +... EVERYWHERE.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My  dog says two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She h as a bit of a sensitive tummy and tends to throw up if she eats some snacks, but she tolerates these quite well. She is always excited to get one.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves 'EM
customer_reviews.text: Nutrisious high quality treat for a dog. My dog really likes the flavor. 3 lbs. gives me about a 3 month supply because I do have a couple other treats to supplement with.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Reseal tasty Treats
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and the dog loves the flavors. Crunchy but easy to break by hand. I have a larger chihuahua mix and she can’t chew anything too hard. These lads the test!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo --APPLE --Health Bars Natural Crunchy Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog REALLY likes these treats. My dog is sort of small, so I have to break these biscuits up into four pieces. No big deal to do this... I will keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: PRBM

customer_reviews.title: Jaxson loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dog and he loved them so I got them for my grand dog for Christmas. She likes them too. We've tried multiple flavors and I like that they're fruits
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: My ladies love Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo Health Bars Natural Crunchy Dog Treats Biscuits are loved by my 2 ladies. It is their bedtime treat and they impatiently wait for them every evening.
customer_reviews.author: L A Cahoun

customer_reviews.title: Was Good. But opinion has changed.
customer_reviews.text: My big dog likes these, so I reorder for him. Revision: Both of my dogs have rejected recent order received. Loved previous orders. Now they won't even come back later to eat them when left in their bowl, like they usually will for just so so treats. It's like this batch tastes and/or smells nothing like the previous orders, which were very desirable.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: My miniature schnoodle loves this treat, I used to break the larger bar in half, but this size is perfect, and I don't have lots of crumbs from breaking the larger bar.
customer_reviews.author: lsl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs really like them
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs sometimes don't like the "healthier" dog biscuits we have tried, but they love these! They are big enough that we break them in half for our small dog, and give our large dog the entire biscuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value! The price was not bad for the size of the bag. My dogs seem to like them just fine. They seem to be fairly healthy...I think? They were a bit crunched up when I received them, though, which may not necessarily be the fault of this company. But there were lots of small pieces, which is fine (just not how they were intended to be sold).
customer_reviews.author: KKuhn

customer_reviews.title: flavors have changed, and not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: Our 130 lb mastiff has loved these treats for years, all flavors especially the apple and yogurt. I have in the past, written a rave review. Now, something has changed with the recipe. We have tried every flavor available and now not only does he sniff and turn his head, but if he happens to to grab one quickly, he spits it back out. I used to buy these in the 3 lb boxes, now even when we change up with the 1 lb. bags, it's the same response. I don't know of another brand of large biscuits that I trust to be not only healthy, but tasty and I'm just wasting a lot of products.
customer_reviews.author: j.kirk

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them
customer_reviews.text: Our spaniel enjoys these treats. the box is big and the treats are a nice size. I got these on a subscribe and save coupon deal to try. I would buy these again for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: she looks so cute and happy when she crunches her "cookies
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull / lab mix LOVES these! She loves treats of any kind, but these are her favorites. We break them in half and feed her a half at a time, she looks so cute and happy when she crunches her "cookies." They smell just like pumpkin, too, always reminds me of carving my pumpkin on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Carla DavisTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Expired treats
customer_reviews.text: I just received my treats today and they are expired. There is no return option so I guess I’m stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: B@uker

customer_reviews.title: A healthy treat in just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a healthy treat for my little 20 pound, 11 year old Pebbles. She loves them, they are not too hard, they are just the right size and they are healthy so I can feel good about feeding them to her.
customer_reviews.author: Coll

customer_reviews.title: My dogs give these treats ⭐️ ⭐️  ⭐️  ⭐️  ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I first found this product at Walmart. They ran out, so I searched Amazon because my dogs love these so much. This has become their special treat. These are big enough to split in half... just don’t let your dog catch you doing it. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Teri Clark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are Huge and Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small treat used as a reward or for training this is not it. These bars are large. I have to break them in half as a treat for my beagle. She likes them and they smell great. But, they are so crumbly - including when I break them in half - that when she eats them I have crumbs on the floor. Kinda messy and too big as reward/training treats for a small to medium size dog.
customer_reviews.author: E Quaker

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Health Bars Natural Crunchy Dog Treats Biscuits
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Banana & Yogurt| Size:16 ozA favorite of health-conscious pet parents, Blue Buffalo Health Bars deliver the great taste and satisfying crunch our furry friends love, but without the corn, wheat and soy known to cause allergic reactions in some dogs. Made with the finest natural ingredients, fortified with omega 3 and antioxidants, and oven-baked for a big crunch, these treats are as healthy as they are tasty!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Made with wholesome whole grains and nutritious vegetables, fortified with Omega 3 fatty acids and important antioxidants, and Contains no corn, wheat or soy
feature_bullets: MADE WITH BANANAS: BLUE Health Bars dog treats prove that a healthy treat can be tasty, too. With ingredients like oatmeal, bananas and yogurt, they feature the ingredients you’ll be proud to feed your furry family members.
CRUNCHY DOG TREATS: For dogs that prefer a crunch, these dog biscuits are oven baked for a texture they’ll love.

WHOLESOME INGREDIENTS: These dog treats contain omega 3 fatty acids and important antioxidants to help your dog maintain a healthy immune system. Plus, they don’t contain any chicken (or poultry) by-product meals and are free from corn, wheat, soy, artificial preservatives like BHA and artificial colors.

HEALTHY DOG TREATS: Made with only the finest natural ingredients and enhanced with vitamins and minerals, Blue Buffalo natural dog treats feature the ingredients you’ll love feeding as much as they’ll love eating.
Contains (1) 16-oz bag of BLUE Health Bars Natural Crunchy Dog Treats Biscuits, Banana & Yogurt
